Acterys Copy

 

Acterys Copy allows you to copy data between different Acterys scenarios and models with the option to use any level of detail. For example copying data from previous year’s actuals as the basis for a new plan either as a whole or with further dimension detail e.g. only a particular cost center, product, etc.

Visual Configuration Details:

Acterys Wiki

Acterys YouTube Channel

Important:

This visual requires an Acterys Subscription.
Please start a free trial here: https://www.acterys.com/start-your-trial/

Find a Partner near you:

 www.acterys.com
